text: 1. I want to make this chocolate donut cake. 2. Every time I drive onto the track at the car wash I feel like I’m about to fail a test. 3. Everything Martha cooks in a day. 4. S’mores la columbe is where its at. 5. How to become the pope. 6. TV things!! Oh my gosh – Ransom Canyon. I am obsessed. It’s like a mix between Yellowstone, Friday Night Lights and Virgin River. I love. I didn’t know it was a book series! 7. 5 things to know before decluttering. 8. There is no better feeling that decluttering! Yesterday I did the garage and it was life giving.
html:
1. I want to make this chocolate donut cake.

2. Every time I drive onto the track at the car wash I feel like I’m about to fail a test.

3. Everything Martha cooks in a day.

4. S’mores la columbe is where its at.

5. How to become the pope.

6. TV things!! Oh my gosh – Ransom Canyon. I am obsessed. It’s like a mix between Yellowstone, Friday Night Lights and Virgin River. I love. I didn’t know it was a book series!

7. 5 things to know before decluttering.

8. There is no better feeling that decluttering! Yesterday I did the garage and it was life giving.
